summary: Wenches Of Skyrim adds 100's of new 'Wench' NPC's to towns, making towns sexier in every way.
descriptionHtml:
Ever thought there was a lack of NPC's in skyrim's towns?
Ever though Skyrim wasn't sexy enough?
Ever thought the world of Skyrim needed more naked Wenches?

Well, this mod sorts it all out.

[url=http://vimeo.com/80154905]Wenches Of Skyrim Mod Promo[/url] from [url=http://vimeo.com/user22935609]Jez[/url] on [url=https://vimeo.com]Vimeo[/url].
^^ Video ^^ Couldn't directly add, as youtube doesn't allow nudity :)


100's of 'Wenches' overall added to (Currently) - Whiterun, Solitude, Riften.
1 fully functional 'Wench' follower (Powerful) available in Whiterun's 'The Bannered Mare, '(named Sexy Wench). Will complete usual follower tasks (trade etc). This follower levels with the player.
They are all naked bar an amulet of mara, and complete miscellaneous tasks.

Wenches are strong! Especially for lower levelled players, so beware of attacking.
They have numerous spells and shouts. If you do decide to kill one, they have fairly good drops.

Future plans:-
- Add Wenches to EVERY city and village.
- Have 50+ unique Wenches.
- Have an optional Wench file for every player home.
- Further variety of Wenches - ie, different skimpy armours etc.
- Increased amount of Wench followers - each with individual traits, whilst keeping their sexy level OVER 9000.

Install Instructions:-
Drag data folder to data folder in skyrim directory. Or use NMM

(Required Mods -
- Any nude mod!
My favourite is nude and jiggly!)

Updates - 24/11/2013 - Fixed Dark-Face-Bug
- 25/11/2013 - Fixed Dark-Face-Bug FOR REALSIES
- 09/12/2013 - Working on Update with more variety of wenches in current locations, but creation kit has become very buggy. Will release ASAP. (Don't want to release a file half finished :) )
author: Jez Etherton
